mainStack: main tech from profile matching job description. 5 at maximum (comma separated)
projectName: Choose a project name from profile
projectDescription: Adapt chosen project description, concise for job application
experienceDescription: Adapt MAHLE experience description, concise for job application
relevantStack: Briefly talk about relevant competences. Followed by a list of all competences from profile matching job description (comma separated)
collegeSkills: Adapt Computer Science college experience description, concise for job application
courseSkills: Adapt Mechatronics course experience description, concise for job application
